# katapult_load_balancer_rule (Data Source)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Get load balancer rule by ID
data "katapult_load_balancer_rule" "web-redirect" {
  load_balancer_id = "lbrule_tBDxLKy1r0OR4Wjl"
}
```
